attributes.additional_details: Would like the government to make newspaper editors accountable if explicit headlines appear on the front page ( eg Friday 27th June - Daily Mirror- Jimmy Savile) These depraved details are in eye line with impressionable young children. Pornograpy etc are kept on top shelves. Newspaper headlines reach those we need to protect.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the respective newspapers - the Government does not interfere with what is in the press, if it is within the law.
